verbose_text: In contrast, when the repressing activity of the Gal4-HESX1-WT or Gal4-HESX1-R159W fusion proteins was assessed in a system dependent on direct binding of the HESX1-WT or HESX1-R159W to the P3 consensus DNA, the mutant protein showed impaired repression relative to the wild type.
evidence: binding of the HESX1-WT or HESX1-R159W to the P3
